level.text: No person shall act as an inspector in an event without an inspector’s license issued pursuant to this chapter.

An applicant for a license as an inspector shall pass a written or oral examination administered by the Commission which tests an applicant’s knowledge of the rules governing contests of the type for which the applicant is qualified to act as an inspector.
An applicant for a license as an inspector shall prove to the satisfaction of the
Does not maintain, directly or indirectly, a financial or business interest in the management of a contestant;
Is not an individual promoter; and
Is not a stockholder or an employee of, or otherwise has a financial or business interest in a corporation, unincorporated club, partnership, or association that promotes contests.
